startLocation.address: Lake Esplanade, Queenstown, Otago 9300, New Zealand

name: Ultimate Adventure Expedition
summary: Embark on the best adventure tour, combining adrenaline-pumping activities and breathtaking landscapes.
description: Prepare for the journey of a lifetime with our Ultimate Adventure Expedition. Over the course of 7 days, you'll experience heart-pounding activities, explore diverse landscapes, and create memories that will last a lifetime.

locations.activity: Kick off your adventure with a thrilling bungy jump from the historic Kawarau Bridge.
Experience the awe-inspiring beauty of Milford Sound with a scenic cruise surrounded by majestic fjords.
Leap into the sky with a tandem skydiving experience over the stunning landscapes of Queenstown.
Embark on a challenging hike through the scenic landscapes of Wanaka, offering panoramic views.
